did.abstract: Letters from prominent N.C. officials and friends of Caldwell, concerning North Carolina politics, internal affairs, and family matters. One letter of 1864 reports on the trials of deserters and the shortage of rations. Another letter of 1848 mentions the Whigs and the recent presidential election.
